content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm alright, a little sad about my dog that died recently
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. How long did you have him/her for?
10 years. We were really close. He was a really good boy
I bet he was. I'm sure he had a great life with you and your family
Yeah, he did. It's just hard to think about him not being around anymore.
I know what you mean. I had a dog that passed away a few years ago and I still think about her all the time
Yeah, it's been a few weeks and I still think about him all the time too.
It's hard to move on, but I think it's important to remember all the good times you had together
Yeah, I try to do that. I know he's in a better place now
I'm sure he is. I'm here for you if you need to talk
No problem. Have a good day
